title: North Shore Deli
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a veggie burger with roasted red pepper, garlic aioli, spinach, tomato and onion on ciabatta bread; a Greek flatbread (with feta and tzatziki sauce); a vegan flatbread with hummus and veggies; an Asian peanut noodle salad; hummus; and option to add portabello mushroom to your dish. Vegans should specify to be sure.
